title: Own The Night
lyrics:
Sunset, windows down
We're ridin'
Head back, music loud
The way it's sposed to be
Let's get out of town, keep drivin'
Yeah, I like the way it sounds to me



And I won't stop, I'm not givin' up

I'm not givin' up the feelin'

Said I, can't stop, never get enough

I like the way it sounds to me



Oh, 'til the stars burn out the sky

We have freedom all the night

Oh, we have freedom all the night

We have freedom all the night, go

(Hey) We have freedom all the night

We have freedom all the night



Get loud while we're young, we're wreckless

Slow down, live it up

This view is all we need

Lights shine just for us, we're fearless

Yeah, I like the way it sounds to me



And I won't stop, I'm not givin' up

I'm not givin' up the feelin'

Said I, can't stop, never get enough

I like the way it sounds to me



Oh, 'til the stars burn out the sky

We have freedom all the night

Oh, we have freedom all the night

We have freedom all the night, go

(Hey) We have freedom all the night

We have freedom all the night



Let's keep on runnin', we're runnin' now

No lookin' back

Let's keep on runnin', we're runnin'

We don't need nothin, no, nothin', no

We're cool with that

We don't need nothin, no, nothin'



Oh, 'til the stars burn out the sky

We have freedom all the night

Oh, we have freedom all the night

We have freedom all the night

(Hey) We have freedom all the night

We have freedom all the night
